Aside all these there are still reasons to invest early because sometimes people lose their jobs one way or the other which may not be their fault and the next step for them will either be getting another job or starting their own business (this one may be tasking if they don't have capital while the other is that they may start hunting for job which may take years before getting a good one).In the end the best is to plan early so that getting something to fall back on after retirement, if one might not get old their children and family may have something to fall back on since we have heard of stories are some families final struggles Started after the death of their breadwinner. Investing in bitcoin won't be a bad idea either like Hal Finney did for his children
